description: Adversaries may use NTFS file attributes to hide their malicious data in order to evade detection
name: Execute From Alternate Data Streams
query: (process.command_line:*txt\:* AND ((process.command_line:*type\ * AND process.command_line:*\ >\ *) OR (process.command_line:*makecab\ * AND process.command_line:*.cab*) OR (process.command_line:*reg\ * AND process.command_line:*\ export\ *) OR (process.command_line:*regedit\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \/E\ *) OR (process.command_line:*esentutl\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \/y\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \/d\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \/o\ *)))
author: frack113
